content.rendered:
Looking for a PRIVY alternative?

Meet Sleeknote: The User-Friendly Alternative to Privy

Drag, drop, customize, and set your popup live. From email capture to Shopify product recommendations, Sleeknote has everything you need for creating high-converting popups. 🚀

Try Sleeknote For Free
 

The PRIVY alternatıve worth the swıtch

Smart Marketers’ Favorite Popup Builder

With Sleeknote’s drag-and-drop editor and rich template gallery, it’s a matter of minutes to design your first popup. Sleeknote is built for busy marketers. That’s why we made it ridiculously easy for you to customize every element of your popups, without any design or coding skills. With Sleeknote, you get access to everything, including exclusive features for Shopify, from day one—regardless of your pageviews or pricing plan.

Start Your Free Trial Now

REASON #1

 

Drag-and-Drop Popup Builder

Don’t waste valuable hours on complicated popup builders. With Sleeknote’s drag-and-drop editor and 120+ conversion-ready templates, you can create branded website popups in minutes—both for desktop and mobile.

Design Your Popup in Minutes

REASON #2

Easy (and Advanced) Features

Whether you want to target visitors based on their location, interests, basket items, or cookies, Sleeknote has all the targeting options you need—both advanced and simple. All features are included in all plans, so you can enjoy Sleeknote fully on an unlimited number of websites.

Try All Features

REASON #3

 

Complete Popup Customization

Take full control over your website popups. Customize your popups as much as you need with your brand colors, background images, custom fonts, and much more.

Design a Branded Popup

REASON #4

Multistep Popups for Better Segmentation

Go beyond generic email forms. With our multistep popups, you can collect visitor information in multiple steps, without scaring them off with too many input fields. More signup data = better email segmentation.

Try a Multistep Popup

REASON #5

 

No-Code Product Recommendation Popups

Add dynamic product recommendations into your popups with one click. Make relevant recommendations on the right pages to increase average order value. (Integrates directly with Shopify, Clerk, and Hello Retail.)

Try Product Recommendations

REASON #6

Personalized Popups Triggered by Real-Time Data

Show a unique popup to each visitor based on what’s in their basket, how much they’re about to spend, what brands they’re interested in, and much more. Collect relevant emails, prevent cart abandonment, and sell more with personalized popups.

Try Sleeknote SiteData

REASON #7

World-Class Customer Support

We believe that Sleeknote is more than just a product. Our outstanding customer success team is ready to go above and beyond to help solve your problems—both before and after you join the Sleeknote family.

Meet Sleeknote Today

REASON #8

One Free Custom-Designed Popup

We want you to get the best possible results out of your 7-day trial. That’s why, when you start a free Sleeknote trial, our team of conversion specialists offer to design your first popup in your brand’s style—at no cost.

Claim Your Free Popup

Join 2,000+ E-Commerce Marketers Who Found the Best Privy Alternative

One Subscription. Multiple Popups.

Create multiple, unique popups for different groups of visitors for each of your goals.

Collect More Emails

Grow a segmented email list with quality subscribers.

Increase Your Sales

Sell more to your website visitors and make the most of your traffic.

Guide Your Visitors

Send visitors to the right products and pages at the right time.

Help Visitors Out

Invite visitors with to contact you at the exact moment they need help.

Sleeknote integrates with your favorite systems in minutes 😍

Ready to Try Sleeknote?

Sleeknote is the user-friendly alternative to OptinMonster, OptiMonk, MailMunch, Gleam, Unbounce, Bounce Exchange, Wisepops, Sumo, GetSiteControl, Hello Bar, Privy, JustUno, Poptin, ConvertFlow, Wishpond, and Thrive Leads.

More than 2,000 companies boost their revenue day after day. Join them today.

Start your 7-day free Sleeknote trial and begin capturing and converting more visitors today.

Start Free Trial
